page.title: 04TRAFFIC IN LECHLADE
page.content: {CENSUS.}Between 11a.m. and 12 noon on July 2nd. a traffic census was held. Traffic was recorded coming from Burford and Faringdon and in the opposite direction from Fairford and Swindon. Both were recorded passing through the Market Square. {FREQUENCY A.}We watched the traffic coming from Swindon and Fairford and 397 vehicles passed. An average 6.6 vehicles went by each minute - 1 vehicle every 9.09 seconds. {FREQUENCY B.}We recorded traffic from Burford and Faringdon and 403 vehicles went past. Every minute 6.7 vehicles passed by - an average of 1 vehicle every 8.9 seconds. There have been plans for a number of years to build a{by-pass}to relieve the traffic in the town centre much of which comes from the{U.S.A.F.}based at {R.A.F. Fairford.
